title: WTB:  Looking to buy a few PSA HOFers - list inside incl Cobb, Young, Johnson+
author: bounce

posts.post_title: WTB:  Looking to buy a few PSA HOFers - list inside incl Cobb, Young, Johnson+
posts.post_content:
Heading for Chicago this year, but thought I'd start shopping for a few things early, maybe I can narrow my list before I get there.

I'm focused mostly on eye appeal over technical grade, but figure most of what would fall in my budget would be PSA 3 to PSA 6 on most of these.

I like to display these amongst my autograph items, so they need to look good!

I also prefer the portraits, but would consider any.

Here's what I'm currently in the market for in T206s:
Ty Cobb
Christy Mathewson
Tris Speaker
Nap Lajoie
Walter Johnson
Cy Young
Eddie Collins
Willie Keeler
Roger Bresnahan
Fred Clarke
Jimmy Collins
Hugh Duffy
Hughie Jennings

Please PM me with anything you've got - thanks!
